Description: Exploring, inspecting, and learning through repetitive physical activity.

The ability to use objects, actions, or ideas to represent other objects, actions, or ideas and may include taking on roles. ^[Symbolic Play (n.d.). Retrieved from https://www.pgpedia.com/s/symbolic-play]

Involves experimenting with objects to build things; learning things that were previously unknown with hands on manipulations of materials.^[Constructive Play (n.d.). Retrieved from https://www.pgpedia.com/c/constructive-play]

Imposes rules that must be followed by everyone that is playing; the logic and order involved forms that the foundations for developing game playing strategy^[Games with Rules (n.d.). Retrieved from https://www.pgpedia.com/g/games-rules]
